header_text: You are at the airport rushing to catch a plane. You feel your heart racing as you step on the plan and sit down. Starting to sweat and breathe quickly, you fear that you might have a panic attack.

elements.Text: Is it necessary to get off the plane because you feel your heart beating rapidly?

elements.name: You are at the airport rushing to catch a plane. You feel your heart racing as you step on the plan and sit down. Starting to sweat and breathe quickly, you fear that you might have a panic attack._Physical Health_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
